Line 65: Line 65:
==Media coverage==
==Media coverage==
â
Bono Mack has been the subject of numerous profiles for a wide array of publications and television shows, including ''[[People (magazine)|People]]'', ''Capital Style'', ''[[Elle (magazine)|Elle]]'', ''[[Entertainment Tonight]]'', ''[[Esquire (magazine)|Esquire]]'', ''[[George (magazine)|George]]'', ''[[Good Housekeeping]]'', ''[[Hello Magazine|Hello!]]'', ''[[Ladies' Home Journal]]'', and [[PBS]]. In 1998, Bono Mack was named one of the Most Fascinating Women of 1998 by ''Ladies' Home Journal'' magazine in conjunction with [[CBS]] Television. She was also selected by the former ''George'' magazine as one of the 20 most fascinating women in politics. In 2008, she was named the "Seventh Hottest Politician in the World" by ''[[Maxim (magazine)|Maxim]].'' Photographs purportedly showing a woman licking Bono Mack's breast were published in January 2011. The woman is Edra Blixseth, a political donor who is being investigated for fraudulently representing her financial worth to a number of banks.<ref name="Lesbian Pictures Of GOP Congresswoman Released">{{cite news
+
Bono Mack has been the subject of numerous profiles for a wide array of publications and television shows, including ''[[People (magazine)|People]]'', ''Capital Style'', ''[[Elle (magazine)|Elle]]'', ''[[Entertainment Tonight]]'', ''[[Esquire (magazine)|Esquire]]'', ''[[George (magazine)|George]]'', ''[[Good Housekeeping]]'', ''[[Hello Magazine|Hello!]]'', ''[[Ladies' Home Journal]]'', and [[PBS]]. In 1998, Bono Mack was named one of the Most Fascinating Women of 1998 by ''Ladies' Home Journal'' magazine in conjunction with [[CBS]] Television. She was also selected by the former ''George'' magazine as one of the 20 most fascinating women in politics. In 2008, she was named the "Seventh Hottest Politician in the World" by ''[[Maxim (magazine)|Maxim]].'' Photographs purportedly showing a woman licking Bono Mack's breast were published in January 2011. The woman is [[Edra Blixseth]], a political donor who is being investigated for fraudulently representing her financial worth to a number of banks.<ref name="Lesbian Pictures Of GOP Congresswoman Released">{{cite news
